featured.text: As used in the passage, “navigation” clearly means .

His summer course included ancient history, which Papa felt our schools neglected, and navigation, in which we first had a formal examination in the dining room, part of which consisted of tying several knots in a given time limit.

definition.zh_def: 導航，指引導或確定位置和路徑的過程或技術。
definition.en_def: The process or technique of directing or determining the position and course of a vehicle or person.
definition.example: The navigation system helped us find the fastest route to the airport.
